TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void WebPartConnectionsEventHandler(object sender, WebPartConnectionsEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed WebPartConnectionsEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub WebPartConnectionsEventHandler(sender As Object, e As WebPartConnectionsEventArgs)
public delegate void WebPartConnectionsEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, WebPartConnectionsEventArgs ^ e);
type WebPartConnectionsEventHandler = delegate of obj * WebPartConnectionsEventArgs -> unit

Docs.summary: Reprezentuje metodę, która będzie obsługiwać i zdarzenia kontroli.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventHandler> Klasa definiuje procedury obsługi delegata dla dwóch zdarzeń dotyczących <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> kontroli: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> zdarzeń i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> zdarzeń. Metoda, która obsługuje <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> zdarzenie jest <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnected%2A> metody. Metoda, która obsługuje <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> zdarzenie jest <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnected%2A> metody. W obu przypadkach dane zdarzeń są zawarte w <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs> obiektu.

Docs.related: Części sieci Web platformy ASP.NET, stron
